alert.note: Alert for Northern Trinity; Southern Trinity (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 06 at 12:56AM PST until January 06 at 10:00PM PST by NWS Eureka
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY NOW IN EFFECT FROM 4 AM EARLY THIS MORNING TO 10 PM PST THIS EVENING ABOVE 2500 FEET... * WHAT...Snow expected above 2500 feet. Total snow accumulations of 2 to 8 inches. Higher accumulations on isolated peaks. Winds gusting as high as 35 mph. * WHERE...Trinity County. * WHEN...From 4 AM early this morning to 10 PM PST this evening. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult to impossible. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Most likely snow accumulation of 1 to 3 inches along high passes of Highway 299, of 2 to 5 inches along Highway 36, and 4 to 8 inches along high passes of Highway 3.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions for the state of California can be obtained by calling 1-800-GAS-ROAD.
